snippet: Speaking to National Guard members in Reno, Nev., Mitt Romney expressed gratitude for troops serving overseas and said the defense budget should not be cut.
abstract: Mitt Romney addresses National Guard members in Reno, Nev, expressing gratitude for troops serving overseas and says the defense budget should not be cut; speech is effort to quell criticism over his failure to mention American troops or the Afghan war effort during his speech at the Republican convention.
lead_paragraph: Speaking to National Guard members in Reno, Nev., Mitt Romney expressed gratitude for troops serving overseas and said the defense budget should not be cut.

headline.seo: After Criticism, Romney Thanks Armed Forces
headline.main: After Criticism of His Convention Speech, Romney Thanks Nation’s Armed Forces
headline.print_headline: After Criticism of His Convention Speech, Romney Thanks Nation’s Armed Forces

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
